short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to pick colors from webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the ultimate tool for web designers, developers, and digital artists. Our Chrome extension lets you effortlessly pick colors from any webpage and instantly get their hex values. With just a click, you can copy the hex code to your clipboard, ready to use in your projects.
